title: Garrett Burgwardt
author: Garrett Burgwardt
content: I'm not sure the going price of these guys but they're all in near mint condition - some with light smudging from the redeeming process, and of course the stickers are all peeled up so there is damage to the anti tamper stuff.Will post pics on request, I'm not sure what the going rate for these is, anyone care to make an offer or help me out? I couldn't find any redeemed gilt coins being sold here or ebay which I thought was strange

comments.author: blucepheus
comments.body: Pics? I think those would be fun to auction here.

comments.author: SurfinPanda
comments.body: I am interested in buying 1 or 2 depending on price you are asking

comments.author: bitcoinbass
comments.body: Still available? Any pictures will be appreciated. Thanks

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Very cool that you still have these. Is there a story behind them that you’d like to tell? For example, were you the one who redeemed these? If so, did you redeem them recently or was it a long time ago? Do you have anything about the experience of owning or peeling them that you would like to share with other owners?

comments.author: Garrett Burgwardt
comments.body: Sounds like perhaps I will host an auction, didn't realize there'd be this much demandI bought these way back when. Didn't want to deal with risks involved in selling them unredeemed, so redeemed them myself. I'll get pics up and host an auction I suppose, sometime this weekend, unless someone wants to make an offer on the whole set

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: Garrett Burgwardt on May 13, 2023, 06:47:24 PMSounds like perhaps I will host an auction, didn't realize there'd be this much demandI bought these way back when. Didn't want to deal with risks involved in selling them unredeemed, so redeemed them myself. I'll get pics up and host an auction I suppose, sometime this weekend, unless someone wants to make an offer on the whole setHappy to help out with anything needed...auction, escrow, shipping/reshipping Sent you a PM

comments.author: Garrett Burgwardt
comments.body: Hello again everyone, way more interest than I expected! Good news I suppose.I double checked the depths of my storage and I actually have 14 total coins, all redeemed. I am working on photos (watermarking is tedious) and will post them shortly, then start an auction.What is the preferred method for that? Should I start it up in this thread or make a new one?

comments.author: Garrett Burgwardt
comments.body: Quote from: Garrett Burgwardt on May 14, 2023, 05:27:15 PMHello again everyone, way more interest than I expected! Good news I suppose.I double checked the depths of my storage and I actually have 14 total coins, all redeemed. I am working on photos (watermarking is tedious) and will post them shortly, then start an auction.What is the preferred method for that? Should I start it up in this thread or make a new one?And here are the images - feel free to ask for specific ones I suppose. They're all about the same (at worst, a fingerprint from the peeling), they've been kept in those coin cases since I first bought them, in climate controlled storage. It's surprisingly hard to get good pictures of them with just my iphone and scanner.https://ibb.co/dmXhnzphttps://ibb.co/FKtBBNchttps://ibb.co/nkmV2x2https://ibb.co/sqxcrHMhttps://ibb.co/V9bGT7qhttps://ibb.co/QNq0LxX

comments.author: BTCOVERFIATS
comments.body: Quote from: Garrett Burgwardt on May 14, 2023, 05:42:04 PMQuote from: Garrett Burgwardt on May 14, 2023, 05:27:15 PMHello again everyone, way more interest than I expected! Good news I suppose.I double checked the depths of my storage and I actually have 14 total coins, all redeemed. I am working on photos (watermarking is tedious) and will post them shortly, then start an auction.What is the preferred method for that? Should I start it up in this thread or make a new one?And here are the images - feel free to ask for specific ones I suppose. They're all about the same (at worst, a fingerprint from the peeling), they've been kept in those coin cases since I first bought them, in climate controlled storage. It's surprisingly hard to get good pictures of them with just my iphone and scanner.https://ibb.co/dmXhnzphttps://ibb.co/FKtBBNchttps://ibb.co/nkmV2x2https://ibb.co/sqxcrHMhttps://ibb.co/V9bGT7qhttps://ibb.co/QNq0LxXWill all of them be auctioned or are you accepting offers?

comments.author: Garrett Burgwardt
comments.body: I will auction them all, with the 14 highest bids winning. Highest bid gets their first pick of the coins, then next highest, and so on.

comments.author: BTCOVERFIATS
comments.body: Quote from: Garrett Burgwardt on May 14, 2023, 05:50:12 PMI will auction them all, with the 14 highest bids winning. Highest bid gets their first pick of the coins, then next highest, and so on.Okay I just sent you a PM before I saw your response on this thread

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Nice looking coins indeed....will be following these beauties and perhaps joining depending on how high the prices go!    Have not seen this many silver/Gilt coins together on this foum ever!  Goodluck with your auction and may the best bidders win!

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: Garrett Burgwardt on May 14, 2023, 05:50:12 PMI will auction them all, with the 14 highest bids winning. Highest bid gets their first pick of the coins, then next highest, and so on.Maybe split it up into 2x auctions

comments.author: Garrett Burgwardt
comments.body: Quote from: minerjones on May 14, 2023, 06:30:33 PMQuote from: Garrett Burgwardt on May 14, 2023, 05:50:12 PMI will auction them all, with the 14 highest bids winning. Highest bid gets their first pick of the coins, then next highest, and so on.Maybe split it up into 2x auctionsI'm sympathetic to the idea that my plan is complicated, but I don't see that two auctions is that much better than one, personally.Or I could just put up auctions for all 14 separately, but that would spam the forum badly.

comments.author: Garrett Burgwardt
comments.body: Writing up a draft auction right now, will post it tomorrow to make sure I cross my Ts and dot my Is and everything looks good. It'll run for at least two weeks

comments.author: Garrett Burgwardt
comments.body: Ended up posting today. Go ahead and bid on your favorites https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5452735.new#new
